doctor.name: Dr. Mohammad Saiful Islam
doctor.specialty: Orthopedics (Bone, Joint, Trauma, Spine) Specialist & Surgeon
doctor.info: Dr. Mohammad Saiful Islam is a Orthopedic Surgeon in Mymensingh. His qualification is MBBS (Dhaka), BCS (Health), MS (Ortho), FACS (USA), FICS (USA), APSS Fellowship (Hong Kong), Fellowship in Pediatric Ortho (Pune, India), AO Spine Basic Course (Guwahati, India), AO (Trauma) Basic, Advance & Masters Course, Master Training on Club Foot Management (NITOR). He is a Professor & Head, Orthopedic Surgery at Mymensingh Medical College & Hospital. He regularly provides treatment to his patients at Popular Diagnostic Center, Mymensingh. Practicing hour of Dr. Mohammad Saiful Islam at Popular Diagnostic Center, Mymensingh is 5pm to 10pm (Closed: Friday).

doctor.name: Dr. Md. Sazzad Hosen (Dipu)
doctor.degree: MBBS (Dhaka), BCS (Health), MS (Orthopedics Surgery), FCPS (Ortho Surgery)
doctor.specialty: Orthopedics (Bone, Joint, Spine) Specialist & Trauma Surgeon
doctor.info: Dr. Md. Sazzad Hosen (Dipu) is a highly skilled Orthopedic Specialist and Trauma Surgeon with expertise in bone, joint, and spine conditions. He holds an MBBS from Dhaka, along with BCS (Health), MS in Orthopedic Surgery, and FCPS in Ortho Surgery. With advanced training in AO Trauma from Delhi, India, he specializes in treating fractures, arthritis, spinal disorders, and sports injuries. Currently serving as a Registrar in the Orthopedics Department at Mymensingh Medical College & Hospital, he provides consultations at Mymensingh Divisional Specialized Hospital, Charpara, Mymensingh, from 3 PM to 10 PM (closed on Fridays)

chamber.address: 171, Isha Kha Tower, Dhaka Road, Charpara, Mymensingh
